background_description: The background consists of a light, fine sandy seabed in the foreground and midground, appearing somewhat blurry. The upper part of the image features a darker, blurred aquatic environment with muted green and blue tones, suggesting open water or distant structures.
explanation: The image clearly displays a Spotted Boxfish with its distinctive boxy body, yellowish-gold coloration, and prominent bright blue spots. Its vibrant patterns and distinct shape make it stand out against the sandy seabed and blurred aquatic background, indicating a clear absence of camouflage.
